column4: akrohit: I think it is ctrl+alt+prtscn+k   or ctrl+shift+prtscn+k    its sysrq, but you gota hit some combo to get it
PrtScn & SysRq are the same key
I dunno, but that commands works-for-me
initially I had samba4 installed and then uninstalled it.. put samba in and it worked as long as I restarted it after boot..
